game.name: DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아하하하하하하하하하, 여러분, 이제부터 롬과 죽음은 여러분에게 같은 의미입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DR LIVESEY: AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA, gentlemen, from now on, rom and death means the same thing for you.

reviewHighlights.text: Honestly, I expected something more, apart from the music the game doesn't have much to offer, every room is the same, and everything is terribly uncl...
Zero replayability, but who cares when it offers some of the most creative Steam avatars and profile decorations? 리플레이성은 전혀 없지만, 스팀 프로필을 꾸밀 수 있는 창의적인...
